leve.name: The Baddest Brigade in Town
leve.description: We ride today to show the host of Ishgard the ways of the irregulars. The Ixal glory in their petty victories, mistaking their crude bushwhacking for high art. Aspirants of the Foreign Brigade! From balls to brains, you are rough, tough, and devils enough for an early death. If it must be today, take at least three birds with you.
